issue.title: [Rust] [DateFusion] Physical operators and expressions should have public accessor methods
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11200](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11200). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Physical operators and expressions should have public accessor methods that expose the values used to construct them.

This allows projects that use DataFusion to be able to serialize a physical plan.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11200?focusedCommentId=17262306) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9154
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9154>
